snippet.title: Cross Blitz Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
A new gameplay trailer for CrossBlitz was broadcast during the Summer Showcase, the new card battler from Tako Boy Studios with over 200 cards and a 30-hour campaign. Coming to early access in 2023, wishlist now on Steam.

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
